sentences.sContent: Action and experimentation are the cornerstones of empiricism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Action and experimentation are the cornerstones of empiricism.
sentences.sCn: 行动和尝试是经验主义的基石。

sentences.sContent: Another kind of empiricism has to do with where we get our knowledge.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another kind of empiricism has to do with where we get our knowledge.
sentences.sCn: 另一种经验主义与我们从哪里获取知识有关。

sentences.sContent: OK, so that's one kind of empiricism.
sentences.sContent_eng: OK, so that's one kind of empiricism.

words.tran: 经验主义的，完全根据经验的
经验主义者；使用观察实验法的人；庸医

trans.tranOther: the belief in basing your ideas on practical experience
